targets.query:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.system.cpu")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.guest + r.guest_nice + r.iowait + r.irq + r.nice + r.softirq + r.steal + r.system + r.user }))

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.hostname == "$hostname"
    and r._field == "load5"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.system.io"
    and r._field == "in"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.system.net"
    and r._field == "sent"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.hostname == "$hostname"
    and r.type == "disk_space"
    and r.family !~ /^\/dev/
    and r.family !~ /^\/run/
   )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value", "family"])
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ device: r.family, usage: (r.used / (r.used + r.avail)) }))

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.system.uptime" and
    r._field == "uptime"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.system.ram")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: ((r.used + r.buffers) / (r.free + r.used + r.cached + r.buffers)) * float(v: 100) }))

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.hostname == "$hostname"
    and r._field == "load15"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.system.io"
    and r._field == "out"
  )

  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.system.cpu")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: $__interval, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netdata.$hostname.apps.cpu")

  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_field", "_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / float(v: $cpu_count) }))

list.definition:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /system.cpu$/)
  |> group(columns:["hostname"])
  |> distinct(column:"hostname")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> group()
list.label: Host
list.name: hostname
list.query:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /system.cpu$/)
  |> group(columns:["hostname"])
  |> distinct(column:"hostname")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> group()

list.definition:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.hostname == "$hostname"
    and r.type =~ /^cgroup_.*/
  )
  |> group(columns:["type"])
  |> distinct(column:"hostname")
  |> keep(columns: ["type"])
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.type }))
list.name: containers
list.query:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r.hostname == "$hostname"
    and r.type =~ /^cgroup_.*/
  )
  |> group(columns:["type"])
  |> distinct(column:"hostname")
  |> keep(columns: ["type"])
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.type }))

list.definition:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /netdata.$hostname.cpu.cpu[0-9]*$/)
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column:"_measurement")
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.name: cpu_count
list.query:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement =~ /netdata.$hostname.cpu.cpu[0-9]*$/)
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column:"_measurement")
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement =~ /netdata.cloud.disk.*$/
    and r.type == "disk"
    and r.family !~ /^\//
    and r.family !~ /^fd/
  )
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column:"family")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.name: disks
list.query:
from(bucket: "netdata")
  |> range(start:-20m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement =~ /netdata.cloud.disk.*$/
    and r.type == "disk"
    and r.family !~ /^\//
    and r.family !~ /^fd/
  )
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column:"family")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
